Detailed Description

DiscreteInterface class.

Author:
Peter Mendham
The DiscreteInterface class extends the Interface class to define an interface to Simulink with a with next state values, which are accessible via nx( ).

A ContiuousInterface is assumed to require continuous sample time.

A new interface protocol can be `requested' via InterfaceContainer.newInterface( ).

See also:
Interface, Sim, InterfaceContainer
